Products.name: Virtual Collaboration
Products.description: VR conferencing and event spaces are designed to provide you with an innovative solution for conferencing and collaborate in 3D.

Products.name: Virtual e-Commerce
Products.description: A 3D online shopping environment enabling the creation and management of 3D virtual shops and a unique social online shopping experience.

Products.name: Virtual Marketing
Products.description: VR marketing solutions are customizable marketing simulations designed to create the most immersive and impactful experience.

Products.name: Virtual Training
Products.description: Serious games environments are online space where users interact in real time with 3D learning objects to learn in an immersive and fun way.

Products.name: Virtual Geo Simulations
Products.description: VR geo simulations are 3D realistic geographical simulation of real cities or infrastructures, connected to the Internet in 3D.
